AnyDVD works in the background to automatically remove the copy protection of a DVD movie as soon as itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s inserted into the drive, allowing you then to backup the movie using a DVD backup tool such as CloneDVD and CloneDVD mobile. AnyDVD is capable of removing unwanted movie features, including subtitles and prohibition messages such as copyright and FBI warnings. It also allows you to launch an external application whenever you insert or remove a disc, or prevent Ã¢â‚¬ËœPC-friendlyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ software from automatically launching when you insert a video DVD.
